name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】First Starring Role【轟はじめ⧸ReGLOSS】 #轟はじめ生誕祭2025 [bjPYXtxhm0I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Deal with the devil' by Tia (Cover).
Transition scene with footsteps as Hajime walks across the stage.
Performance of 'Marunouchi Sadistic' by Sheena Ringo (Cover).
scenes.song_name: 丸ノ内サディスティック

subtitles.original: ...覚悟決めて
subtitles.english: ...prepare yourself.

subtitles.original: 震えて溢れ My heart
subtitles.english: My heart is trembling and overflowing.

subtitles.original: 欲しがるようじゃね まだベイビー
subtitles.english: If you're still wanting more, you're still a baby.

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない 感情させて Let me Honey
subtitles.english: Let me feel an emotion second to none, let me, honey.

subtitles.original: あなた 内緒だわ
subtitles.english: You, it's a secret.

subtitles.original: ほら見せてあげる
subtitles.english: See, I'll show you.

subtitles.original: 秘密って甘いもの
subtitles.english: Secrets are sweet things.

subtitles.original: 仕掛けて 罠に嵌めるわ
subtitles.english: I'll set it up and trap you.

subtitles.original: 油断誘うのよ
subtitles.english: Luring you into carelessness.

subtitles.original: 思考を止めたら 終末 (ジ・エンド)
subtitles.english: If you stop thinking, it's the end.

subtitles.original: 何も知らないような顔で落とすわ 鼻先を
subtitles.english: I'll make you fall with a face that knows nothing... right under your nose.

subtitles.original: 急かせる所じゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it time to hurry?

subtitles.original: 読み切って 連鎖だ
subtitles.english: Read it all, it's a chain reaction.

subtitles.original: デッド・オア・アライヴ 見逃さない
subtitles.english: Dead or alive, I won't miss a thing.

subtitles.original: どんな小さなズルだって
subtitles.english: No matter how small the trick...

subtitles.original: アタシの目は誤魔化されないわ
subtitles.english: ...my eyes won't be deceived.

subtitles.original: A million dollars 愛されちゃいたいわ 骨まで
subtitles.english: A million dollars, I want to be loved to the bone.

subtitles.original: 愛し尽くしてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll love you with everything I have.

subtitles.original: 狙った獲物は逃さない
subtitles.english: I won't let the target escape.

subtitles.original: 唇濡らして 頂くわ My babe
subtitles.english: Wetting my lips, I'll take it, my babe.

subtitles.original: ダイヤのジャックで 出揃うわ
subtitles.english: With the jack of diamonds, the hand is complete.

subtitles.original: 笑みを殺し 待つだけ
subtitles.english: Killing the smile, just waiting.

subtitles.original: アタシのポーカーフェイスは いつでもパーフェクト
subtitles.english: My poker face is always perfect.

subtitles.original: 一部の隙も見せたりしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't show even a single opening.

subtitles.original: 深淵感じてるわ
subtitles.english: I'm feeling the abyss.

subtitles.original: お望みなら 最期まで
subtitles.english: If you wish, until the very end.

subtitles.original: 見てばかりいないで 荒らして
subtitles.english: Don't just watch, go wild.

subtitles.original: いかせてはくれない
subtitles.english: You won't let me go.

subtitles.original: 負けるのが怖い？ 弱いチキン
subtitles.english: Scared to lose? You weak chicken.

subtitles.original: 読み切って連鎖だ
subtitles.english: Read it all, it's a chain reaction.

subtitles.original: デッド・オア・アライヴ 見透かして
subtitles.english: Dead or alive, see through it.

subtitles.original: アタシのものにする
subtitles.english: I'll make you mine.

subtitles.original: あなたの髪の一本まで全部
subtitles.english: Every single hair of yours.

subtitles.original: A million dollars 愛されちゃいたいわ 震えてるわボーヤ
subtitles.english: A million dollars, I want to be loved, you're trembling, boy.

subtitles.original: どこまで行くわ
subtitles.english: I'll go anywhere.

subtitles.original: デッド・オア・アライヴ 昂ぶって堪らないわ
subtitles.english: Dead or alive, the excitement is unbearable.

subtitles.original: スリル 誰にも触らせない
subtitles.english: The thrill, I won't let anyone touch it.

subtitles.original: この真似
subtitles.english: Like this...

subtitles.original: A million dollars 愛されちゃいたいわ さあカモン覚悟決めて
subtitles.english: A million dollars, I want to be loved, come on, prepare yourself.

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで撃って
subtitles.english: Shoot until I turn to ash.

subtitles.original: 欲しがるようじゃね まだベイビー
subtitles.english: If you're still wanting more, you're still a baby.

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない 感情させて Let me Honey
subtitles.english: Let me feel an emotion second to none, let me, honey.

subtitles.original: 丸ノ内サディスティック
subtitles.english: Marunouchi Sadistic

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：椎名林檎
subtitles.english: Written and Composed by Sheena Ringo

subtitles.original: 報酬は入社後 並行線で
subtitles.english: The reward will be after joining, on parallel lines.

subtitles.original: 東京は愛せど 何も無い
subtitles.english: Even though I love Tokyo, it has nothing.

subtitles.original: リッケン620頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me a Rickenbacker 620.

subtitles.original: 19万も持って居ない
subtitles.english: I don't even have 190,000 yen.

subtitles.original: お茶の水
subtitles.english: Ochanomizu

subtitles.original: マーシャルの匂いで飛んじゃって大変さ
subtitles.english: Flying off with the smell of Marshall, it's trouble.

subtitles.original: 毎晩絶頂に達して居るだけさ
subtitles.english: Just reaching a climax every night.

subtitles.original: ラット一つを商売道具にしているさ
subtitles.english: Using one Rat as my business tool.

subtitles.original: そしたらベンジーが肺に写ってトリップ
subtitles.english: Then Benjie is reflected in my lungs, and I trip.
